verifications.name: Cache API
verifications.details: Implemented cache API in packages/core available to loaders: cache.set(key, value, ttl) and cache.revalidate(path)

verifications.name: Prerender support
verifications.details: Support export const prerender = { cache: { maxAge: 60 } } in route metadata

verifications.name: Static export adapter
verifications.details: Implemented simple apex deploy --adapter=static to export static HTML files (with revalidation metadata)

verifications.name: Examples
verifications.details: Created examples demonstrating ISR behavior and post-build static export in examples/hello-apex

verifications.name: Tests
verifications.details: Created tests validating cache hits/misses and revalidate behavior

verifications.name: Acceptance criteria
verifications.details: Cache primitives provide cache() and revalidate() functions, ISR implementation works for static pages, simple CDN/static hosting adapter implemented
